title: FS: T207 Commons and a Bender. ALL SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: T207 Commons and a Bender. ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have these T207’s available for sale.  They were part of a scrapbook removal and are generally in pretty good condition.  Please add $3 for tracked shipping.

I’m listening to any and all offers so don’t be shy..... ;)

PM me an email address if you want closer scans
